verbs.description: WASHINGTON -- President Donald Trump 's choice for secretary of state , Mike Pompeo , [V: has] cleared the Senate Foreign Relations Committee with a favorable recommendation , narrowly avoiding a rare rebuke as his confirmation heads to the full Senate .
